title: [Feywrot Mire, Banyan Cirque]
description: A neatly tended garden, oddly out of place in the otherwise marshy environment, flourishes within a tall, wire-fenced area.  Bright ribbons decorate the fence posts and wind through the wire enclosure.  A leaf-stuffed scarecrow, draped in a pink floral dress, sports a oversized lady's hat with furling ribbons dancing in the lightest breeze.

A neatly tended garden, oddly out of place in the otherwise marshy environment, flourishes within a tall, wire-fenced area.  Bright ribbons decorate the fence posts and wind through the wire enclosure.  A leaf-stuffed scarecrow, draped in a pink floral dress, sports an oversized lady's hat with furling ribbons dancing in the lightest breeze.  Protruding through a blanket of peat moss are some pallid grey fungi.
